publicationStmt.p: Published by The Confederation Debates project.

div.p:
HOUSE OF COMMONS.
MONDAY, June 29, 1903.
The SPEAKER took the Chair at Three
o'clock.

PROVINCIAL AUTONOMY FOR THE
NORTH-WEST TERRITORIES.
Mr. BORDEN (Halifax). Before the Or-
ders of the Day are called, I would like to
move, with the consent of the right hon.
gentleman, that the papers brought down
relating to the granting of provincial auton-
omy in the North-west Territories be print-
ed forthwith, and that rule 94 be suspended
for that purpose.
